Text: oh thank u thank u thank u thank u thank u!

I have only tested with XP and it works fine. From other user's responses it indeed seems that it does not work with Vista. 

If somebody gets it to work with Vista, please post a comment.
Finally we got this crack, but i can't run any of the episodes anymore now that i upgraded to Vista, tried disabling DEP and UAC but no luck... anyone got a solution to get em working on Vista? =(

The games already has some issues with Vista, and apparently they are supposed to be fixed in bugfixes that will come with the CD/DVD when it's released retail and when it is shipped out to season 1 customers.
Thanks for cracking me up, little buddy.
